title: Collection Analysis
description: Compute basic metrics about a collection and write back to an output collection

id.title: Spark Job ID
id.description: The ID for this Spark job. Used in the API to reference this job

trainingCollection.title: Training Collection
trainingCollection.description: Solr Collection containing labeled training data

fieldToVectorize.title: Field to Vectorize
fieldToVectorize.description: Solr field containing text training data for prediction/clustering instances,if want to analyze multiple fields with different weights please use the format field1:weight1,field2:weight2

dataFormat.title: Data format
dataFormat.description: Spark-compatible format which training data comes in (like 'solr', 'hdfs', 'file', 'parquet' etc)

trainingDataFrameConfigOptions.title: Dataframe Config Options
trainingDataFrameConfigOptions.description: Additional spark dataframe loading configuration options

trainingDataFilterQuery.title: Training data filter query
trainingDataFilterQuery.description: Solr query to use when loading training data

trainingDataSamplingFraction.title: Training data sampling fraction
trainingDataSamplingFraction.description: Fraction of the training data to use

randomSeed.title: Random seed
randomSeed.description: For any deterministic pseudorandom number generation

outputCollection.title: Output Collection
outputCollection.description: Solr Collection to store model-labeled data to

sourceFields.title: Fields to Load
sourceFields.description: Solr fields to load (comma-delimited). Leave empty to allow the job to select the required fields to load at runtime.

numDeviations.title: Num Deviations
numDeviations.description: Number of standard deviations away from the mean we deem acceptable for this collection.If you want all the documents set this to be high.

dateField.title: Date Field
dateField.description: The field that corresponds to the date field you will be using
